title: [vite-plugin-svelte-kit] Build fails with non standard vite.config.js location
body:
### Describe the bug

I have a monorepo with a shared `vite.config.js` on the top level. I launch all my vite commands with `-c ../../vite.config.js`. Everything works fine except for the `build` command which fails with `Could not load Vite config` during `writeBundle` (see logs below).

### Reproduction

To reproduce execute the following:
```sh
pnpm create svelte@next repro
cd repro
pnpm i
mv vite.config.js _vite.config.js
pnpx vite build -c ./_vite.config.js
```

Note that `pnpx vite dev -c ./_vite.config.js` works fine.
